Title: varPopStable
Description: Returns the population variance. Unlike varPop, this function uses a numerically stable algorithm. It works slower but provides a lower computational error.
x: Population of values to find the population variance of. (U)Int*, Float*, Decimal*.
Returns the population variance of x. Float64.
Examples: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_data;CREATE TABLE test_data(    x UInt8,)ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO test_data VALUES (3),(3),(3),(4),(4),(5),(5),(7),(11),(15);SELECT    varPopStable(x) AS var_pop_stableFROM test_data;
